caption.p: Inhibitory concentrations (IC 50 in μg mL −1) of 127 blends of EOs from seven Greek aromatic-medicinal plants against the fish pathogen Aeromonas veronii bv. sobria. The inset highlights the IC 50 values of the top-10, most effective blends. The composition of the seven EOs in each blend is shown in Table S2 (Supplementary Materials).
